file_content.text: Go right in. Please.
This is the office of Admiral Fraabaal of the Imperial Navy. Do you have business here?
I'm here to see the admiral. Let me in.
That's right.
I don't think so. I doubt the admiral would have anything to do with your kind.
I'm afraid the admiral is not seeing vagrants today.
Can't I just be here to talk to you?
You're cute.
Yes, well, um. Are you? Just here to talk to me, I mean? Oh, I see, you're making fun of me.
I can't imagine why he'd think you were making fun of him and his big important desk....
You work for the admiral, what's he like?
Tell me about your boss.
It's against regulation to discuss superior officers--not to mention bad form.
Beat it, lackey.
I am a lieutenant in the Imperial Navy. Address me with respect, or I will have you publicly flogged.
Now if you'll excuse me, I am very busy.
Let me in there--now.
So am I.
If you'll excuse me, I'm going to shoot you in the head.
Too bad.
What? You wouldn't dare--
I have a job slip from your boss, moron.
You're an idiot.
I really couldn't care less what you--
What's all that racket out there, soldier?
There's a quarrelsome alien here, Admiral. It refuses to leave.
There's a quarrelsome individual here, Admiral. Rather dirty, too.
Quarrelsome? You're as weak as you are stupid. I requested a mercenary from the Mandalorians. Send that person in immediately.
Yes, sir! You may go in now.
Never stand in my way again.
I'll do that.
I'll bet you get a demerit for that, Lieutenant.
That was fun.
Heh. You're terrible.
Next time... bang!
You got lucky.
The admiral is waiting.
This area is off-limits to all but Imperial staff.
